articles.title: Why Ford detuned its EcoBoost engine for the Ranger PHEV
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: A company developed a PHEV (Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle) offering a blend of towing, carrying, and off-road capabilities. The PHEV aims to provide a customer-driven solution by combining these features.

articles.title: Taking Steam Link to the next level with Moonlight
articles.summary: Moonlight, an open-source app built on Nvidia's GameStream, enables streaming from a PC to various devices. Artemis and Razer Game Streaming, forks of Moonlight, provide the ability to convince the PC that the virtual device is another monitor letting you play games at your device's native resolution.

articles.title: Wayfair is selling a 'very handy' $170 countertop ice maker for $65, and shoppers say it 'works fast'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering the Simzlife Countertop Ice Maker for sale. This product is being promoted as a solution for providing ice on demand, particularly useful for summer parties.

articles.title: Jbs NV Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: JBS, a Brazilian meatpacking giant, successfully launched its US public market debut on June 15, 2025. The opening trade valued the company at approximately $30 billion, surpassing rival Tyson Foods in market capitalization.

articles.title: Tyson Foods Inc Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: JBS successfully launched its US public market debut. The opening trade values JBS at approximately $30 billion, surpassing Tyson Foods in market capitalization.

articles.title: Xbox ROG Ally: August Pre-Orders
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Asus is preparing to launch the ROG Ally X, a new handheld gaming device developed in collaboration with Xbox. The ROG Ally X is expected to have enhanced features such as a larger battery, more storage, and an upgraded AMD chip compared to the base ROG Ally model. It is speculated that pre-orders could begin as early as August, with the device potentially hitting shelves in October.

articles.title: Lidl will soon begin selling a £20 Karcher window cleaning dupe that is perfect for keeping mould at bay
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Lidl launched the Tower Cordless Window Cleaner for £19.99. Additionally, Lidl introduced several other products including the Livarno Home Stainless Steel Mug, Crocs-style clogs, Silvercrest Cordless Cyclone Vacuum Cleaner, Vax carpet cleaner, Silvercrest Stand Mixer, Silvercrest 6L Digital Air Fryer and Silvercrest facial cleansing brushes as dupes of popular brands.

articles.title: Lidl will soon begin selling a £20 Karcher window cleaning dupe that is perfect for keeping mould at bay
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Lidl introduced the Tower Cordless Window Cleaner for £19.99 as a cheaper alternative to Kärcher's model. Lidl also launched the Livarno Home Stainless Steel Mug, Silvercrest Cordless Cyclone Vacuum Cleaner, Crocs-style clogs, Silvercrest Stand Mixer, and Silvercrest 6L Digital Air Fryer, all positioned as affordable 'dupes' of more expensive brands.

articles.title: 5 Euros Only!
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: A recent consumer study reveals that powdered laundry detergents often outperform liquid detergents in cleaning power, environmental impact, and overall value, despite liquid detergents dominating market share. While liquid detergents are easier to use, powders have more potent enzymes for stain removal and a higher overall effectiveness score. The evaluation considered washing efficiency, environmental impact, health safety, and value for money.

articles.title: 34 Products With Showstopping Results
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new beauty and cleaning products designed to improve personal care and home maintenance. These include NewGel's scar gel for reducing scars, Mielle's coil sculpting custard for defined curls, and Veet's sensitive hair removal gel formulated with aloe. Other notable products feature cleaning solutions like Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray and an all-natural oven scrub made with pumice stone.

articles.title: New stores that are set to open across Belfast this Summer
articles.author: Content Creator
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new stores in Belfast. Bershka is opening its first Northern Ireland store in Victoria Square. Victoria's Secret is opening a store in Donegall Place. Crew Clothing is reopening a new store in Victoria Square Shopping Centre on June 19. LEGO is making its Northern Irish debut in Victoria Square. Russell & Bromley are opening their first store in Northern Ireland on William Street South. Mango has opened a new store on William Street South.

articles.title: InterLink Labs Surpasses 1 Million Registered Users and Confirms Strategic Investment from Google
articles.author: New To The Street
articles.summary: InterLink Labs launched its super app powered by InterLink ID core technology and achieved over 1 million AI-driven registered scans within three months. Google invested in InterLink Labs, reinforcing its position as a vital Web3 infrastructure provider. A new feature on Interlink's Google-backed technology rollout will premiere this summer.

articles.title: 7 items we loved this week
articles.author: TANYA GARCIA/WALLA
articles.summary: H&M introduced a balloon-cut denim mini skirt. Locali launched a layered tank top set. AFTER SHOWER released a new line of fragrance and body care products, including a shower gel. Miss Nori presented strappy heels. PAYOT launched a facial mist SPF spray, the fourth product in their new sun series. Puma, in collaboration with A$AP Rocky, released a T-shirt. Jean Paul Gaultier introduced Scandal Intense perfume.

articles.title: This T-Mobile free phone offer may be its hottest deal yet
articles.author: Christy Rakoczy
articles.summary: T-Mobile is offering the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge as part of a new promotional deal. Customers can get the phone for free by adding a line to Experience Beyond or Go5G Next service plans, receiving bill credits over 24 months. Alternatively, the phone can be obtained for free with an eligible trade-in device.

articles.title: These 2 Missing Features Are Holding Google Messages Back
articles.author: Cory Gunther
articles.summary: Google is working on improving Google Messages to provide an iMessage-like experience, focusing on multi-device support and customization options. Customization in group chats, such as theme colors and chat icons are available in new updates. The potential updates and improvements will be added with the release of Android 16.

articles.title: 'I compared custard from Ambrosia, Tesco, M&S & Aldi'
articles.author: Stewart Carr
articles.summary: Aldi offers a Ready To Serve Custard. Ambrosia sells Luxury Custard. Tesco markets custard in cans. M&S offers Silky Smooth Custard. Each custard has been reviewed for taste and consistancy.

articles.title: McDonald's is offering free McNuggets and hash browns
articles.author: Alice Giddings
articles.summary: McDonald's is offering free six-piece chicken McNuggets with a £15 McDelivery purchase from June 16-22, and a free hash brown with a £10 McDelivery purchase. They're also launching a new burger called the Big Arch, as well as bringing back the Cheesy McCrispy and Halloumi Fries. Dessert items like the Toffee Crisp McFlurry and Toffee Apple Pie are also returning.

articles.title: You can score free McDonald's hash browns and McNuggets this week — here's how
articles.author: Alice Giddings
articles.summary: McDonald's is offering six-piece chicken McNuggets free from June 16 to June 22 with £15+ McDelivery orders, or free hash browns with £10+ orders. On June 18, McDonald's introduced the new 'Big Arch' burger, along with the return of Cheesy McCrispy, Halloumi Fries, Toffee Crisp McFlurry, and Toffee Apple Pie to their menu.

articles.title: 41 Swaps For More Expensive Products That Are So Good, You'll Want To Cry Happy Tears
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: E.l.f. has launched the Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen SPF 35, a clear gel sunscreen that doubles as a blurring primer. Nyx offers the Fat Oil Lip Drip, a hydrating lip oil with vegan squalane. CeraVe provides the Retinol Serum, designed to prevent irritation while resurfacing the skin.

articles.title: New Nubz Chew Treats from Nylabone Add a Burst of Flavor to the Dog Days of Summer
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nylabone has launched Nubz® Flavor Bursts chew treats, a new addition to their Nubz® dog treat line. These treats are made with real cheddar cheese and bacon flavor, are wheat-free and corn-free, and are available on Amazon.com, Chewy.com, and Walmart.com.

articles.title: New Nubz Chew Treats from Nylabone Add a Burst of Flavor to the Dog Days of Summer
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nylabone, part of Central Garden & Pet, has launched Nubz® Flavor Bursts chew treats. This new product is an addition to their Nubz® dog treat line, timed for summer snacking.

articles.title: 20 Products That'll Be Great For Your Feet
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Carpe introduces antiperspirant foot lotion for sweaty feet, while YogaToes launches gemstone stretchers for foot ailments. Ugg offers cozy insoles for shoe restoration, and Frida Mom presents Leg + Foot Swell Spray for pregnant individuals. Several other companies are also mentioned like offering foot masks, gel pack wraps, and antifungal polishes.

articles.title: Ninja's most popular air fryer that 'pays for itself' and is on sale
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the Ninja Foodi MAX Dual Zone Digital Air Fryer with two independent cooking zones on Amazon for £179.99, a 25% discount, and claims it reduces energy bills by up to 65%.  Geepas offers the 9.2L Air Fryer Vortex Rapid Health Cooker Digital Display Kitchen Oven 5-in-1 for £52.58 from Debenhams, claiming to cook 30% more rapidly.

articles.title: 5 Chicken Nugget Brands That Are Better Than Any Restaurant Nuggets
articles.summary: Just Bare, Perdue, Applegate, Tyson, and Bell & Evans offer chicken nugget options with unique features. Just Bare nuggets are praised for their similarity to Chick-fil-A. Perdue offers chicken nuggets with added vegetables. Applegate provides nuggets with clean ingredients. Tyson offers air-fried nuggets with less fat, and Bell & Evans offers premium chicken nuggets.

articles.title: Only Amazon Prime Members Can Get This Cordless Vacuum on Sale
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Mbyulo has launched the Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, a lightweight device featuring three suction levels, a flexible head with LED headlights, and a convertible handheld design. It is currently on sale for under $150 for Amazon Prime members. Other brands like Eureka, Smoture and Bissell offer alternative cordless vacuums sold on Amazon.

articles.title: Poco F7: Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 Power & Stunning Design
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The Poco F7 is anticipated to be a mid-range smartphone featuring the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, a high refresh rate display (e.g., 120Hz), and a versatile camera system with AI enhancements. It is expected to have 8GB to 16GB of RAM, 128GB to 512GB of storage, and a 50MP main camera, targeting gamers, photography enthusiasts, tech-savvy users, and budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: 28 Small Summer Essentials To Keep In Your Purse
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Revlon introduces an oil-absorbing volcanic face roller, while Touchland offers sanitizer sprays in various scents. Cocokind promotes the Mymatcha All-Over Moisture Stick, and Starface features Hydro-Stars for impurity absorption. I Dew Care launches 'Tap Secret' mattifying powder shampoo, Megababe offers Thigh Rescue, and SweatBlock provides wipes for stopping excessive sweating. TonyMoly presents a solid perfume stick.

articles.title: GWM's Tank 300 diesel is sure to become a favourite off-roader in SA
articles.author: Eyaaz Matwadia
articles.summary: GWM launched the diesel variant of the Tank 300 in South Africa in Q1 2025. The Tank 300 diesel features a 2.4-litre turbocharged diesel engine, off-road capabilities, and a reinforced chassis. The starting price is R699 900.

articles.title: New Balance ABZORB 2000 Surfaces in 'Silver/Black'
articles.summary: New Balance is launching the ABZORB 2000 'Silver/Black' sneaker in Fall 2025 for $170 USD. The shoe features a silver/black colorway with a lightweight mesh upper, reflective accents, and printed 'N' branding. The design emphasizes minimalism and modern aesthetics.

articles.title: 33 Genius Things To Solve Your Summer Problems
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products suitable for the summer season. These include Ogx Argan Oil of Morocco Curl-Defining Cream, Liquid I.V. electrolyte drink mix, Burt's Bees sunburn soother, Beekman 1802's Solar Milk with SPF 50, Eadem Smooth Slate roller serum, Color Wow heat-activated anti-frizz treatment, Veet sensitive hair removal gel, Buns Of Glowry, and Colorescience brush-on mineral powder with SPF 50 and Revlon volcanic face roller, all designed to enhance summer experiences.

articles.title: 65 Mundane Things You'll Use All The Time
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly introduced products and services, including Qualify's chocolate brownie protein powder, PanOxyl Antimicrobial Hydrating Acne Creamy Wash, and Cerave eye repair cream. These products are designed to cater to diverse needs, such as providing plant-based protein, treating acne-prone skin, and revitalizing the skin around the eyes.

articles.title: Most Impressive AI Tool for Creative Digital Marketers in Nigeria
articles.author: Daniel Aiyegbusi
articles.summary: AdCreative.ai has launched an AI-powered platform designed for automated advertising creative generation and optimization. It generates conversion-optimized creatives for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads. The platform offers features such as an AI scoring system for predicting conversion potential and direct integrations with major advertising platforms.

articles.title: I tested out ‘the best ChatGPT hack' after fashion fans reveal how they can always get discount on their clothes
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Shoppers are using ChatGPT to find discount codes for various companies and retailers.  ChatGPT provides codes for fashion brands like Next, BloomChic, True Classic, ASOS, JD Sports, Boohoo, River Island, M&S, and Fashion Nova.  The success rate varies, but users find it a quick way to potentially save money.

articles.title: Pixel's New Google Search Bar: Hot Updates & Features
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google's Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2 introduces an AI-powered search bar, enhancing information retrieval through conversational queries and personalized results. This new feature, accessible via Google Search (AI), aims to provide a more intuitive and efficient search experience by understanding user intent and delivering tailored information, moving beyond simple keyword searches. The update signifies a shift toward proactive and assistive digital experiences, personalizing content and streamlining information access.

articles.title: I used Snapchat+ for a month and I can't get enough of its generative AI features — here's why
articles.author: Darragh Murphy
articles.summary: Snapchat has released its own pair of smart glasses, now evolved into the latest Snap Spectacles AR glasses that push augmented reality even further. Snapchat+ is a subscription service that offers users access to exclusive, experimental and pre-release AI features and tools to enhance and personalize their Snap experience.

articles.title: Embracing Powertrain Diversity, GWM Continues to Enhance Clean Diesel Capabilities for Off-Roading
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: GWM's TANK 300 Diesel features a 2.4T diesel engine with over 200 NVH enhancements, achieving low idle noise and impressive torque of 480N·m. It offers an extended driving range up to 1,200km and fuel consumption under 7.3L/100km, positioning it as a refined and efficient option for both urban and off-road environments.

articles.title: AI in Regulated Industries: Powering Next-Gen Services
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Businesses are implementing AI-driven systems to enhance customer experience by providing personalized interactions, instant support, and efficient issue resolution. Healthcare providers and financial institutions have seen reduced wait times, increased patient satisfaction, and improved fraud detection through the deployment of AI solutions. Retail companies are also employing AI-driven recommendation engines to personalize shopping experiences and increase sales conversion rates.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 launch date and full design leaked, here is everything we know
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 at its upcoming Unpacked event. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 features a slimmer design, potentially measuring 9mm when folded and 4.5mm when open, and is expected to include AI-powered camera enhancements, a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and Samsung's new One UI 8 skin. Additionally, Samsung may also introduce the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and a more affordable Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE model.

articles.title: New name and new premises for Wolverhampton's 'no credit check' retail shop
articles.author: Beverly Rademacher
articles.summary: Trust Shopping has rebranded to 'Trusty' and moved to a new location. The company has expanded its services by opening a physical store offering household appliances and tech gadgets with no credit checks, focusing on upfront payments and flexible repayment options. The new shop has been open for three months and received positive feedback for its simplicity and customer-friendly approach.

articles.title: 34 Truly Excellent Beauty Products
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Sol De Janeiro is featuring their bestselling Bum Bum body cream, formulated to firm and moisturize skin. L'Oreal promotes their eight-second lamellar water rinse-out treatment for revitalizing hair. Mielle is showcasing its scalp and hair strengthening oil, infused with biotin and a blend of jojoba, rosemary, and mint oils.

articles.title: Android June Update: Changes & Who's Affected
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google launched Android 16 on June 10, 2025, featuring live updates in notes, better hearing aid support, and enhanced security. The initial rollout is for Google Pixel 6 and later models, with availability for Samsung and other Android devices expected soon.

articles.title: Android 16: New Features & HP Update Schedule
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google has launched Android 16, a new mobile operating system that enhances user experience through optimized haptics, a revamped camera interface, and performance improvements. The update also includes a new piecewise linear envelope (PWLE) API for consistent haptic feedback and an updated camera interface with advanced image processing. Update schedules will vary, with Google Pixel devices receiving the update first, followed by Samsung, Xiaomi, and Oppo.

articles.title: Discover The Flavorful World Of SKE Crystal Nic Salt By How To Vape
articles.summary: How To Vape introduces SKE Crystal Nic Salt, a new salt nicotine e-liquid designed for smooth and rapid nicotine absorption. It features diverse flavor profiles, delivers satisfying nicotine hit, and is formulated for low-wattage devices. The new product aims to provide a satisfying and flavorful experience for vapers, especially those transitioning from smoking.

articles.title: 25 Affordable And Simple Skincare Products From Target
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article showcases several new skincare products including a Tula face cleanser, E.l.f. daily cleanser, Good Molecules hyaluronic acid serum and Yerba Mate wake-up eye gel, Honest Beauty hydrogel moisturizer, Jergens cherry almond moisturizer and Black Girl Sunscreen SPF 30. These products range from cleansers and moisturizers to serums and sunscreens, highlighting features like hydration, acne treatment, and sun protection with varied price points.

articles.title: 31 Little Upgrades To Your Day-To-Day
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Monday Haircare launched a Dry Shampoo with keratin treatment. Hanalei introduced a Lip Treatment with Hawaiian kuku nut oil, grape seed oil, and agave. Rael released "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches with a hydrocolloid formula. Touchland launched a Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer with an aloe vera-infused formula and flora scent.

articles.title: Incoming 2026 Tesla Model S Triggers Hefty Price Cut On Outgoing Version
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Tesla is releasing a new model, resulting in a fire sale of the older Model S.

articles.title: Pokemon GO Teases New Item
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon GO is introducing a new item through an upcoming update. This item allows players to maximize the power of their Pokemon.
